PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-00912015-02-05TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectRailway Safety Management System Regulations, 2015
PrecisRAILWAY SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM REGULATIONS, 2015 in order to (1) expand the scope of application of safety management system requirements to ensure all companies under federal jurisdiction have such a system; (2) expand the regulatory regime related to safety management systems by including new provisions under the clarified authorities of the Act; and (3) clarify the overall objectives of the safety management system regulations, and the regulatory provisions in relation to safety management systems, in order to facilitate more effective compliance and enforcement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0026 Publication Date: 2015-02-25
AttachmentsAttachment
